snippet: Missouri lawmakers voted to remove several thousand families from a welfare program by imposing shorter time limits for people to receive the benefits.
abstract: Missouri's Republican-led House votes to override Gov Jay Nixon's veto of bill that would reduce a state welfare program and impose stricter work requirements.
lead_paragraph: Missouri lawmakers voted to remove several thousand families from a welfare program by imposing shorter time limits for people to receive the benefits.

headline.main: Missouri: Lawmakers Override Veto of Cuts to Welfare
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Lawmakers Override Veto of Cuts to Welfare
